      <p><strong>Business Problem:</strong> Salmon groups are managed and assessed at different organizational levels (Stock Management Units, Conservation Units, and Designatable Units), creating challenges in linking information across Science and Fisheries and Resource Management Branches, as well as across organizations (DFO and COSEWIC).</p>
      <p><strong>Solution:</strong> The Salmon SMU-CU-DU Crosswalk is an open-access data repository that provides linkages between stock units, tracks CU revisions, and establishes a common vocabulary for DFO. The crosswalk table links Stock Management Units (SMU), Conservation Units (CU), and Designatable Units (DU) to help communicate and assess salmon stocks at distinct levels.</p>
      <p><strong>Outcome:</strong> This crosswalk enables seamless communication between branches and organizations, supports consistent stock assessment, and provides version-controlled data that is reviewed and updated every three months to ensure accuracy.</p>
      <p><strong>Key Features:</strong></p>
      <ul>
        <li>Linkages between stock units (SMU, CU, DU)</li>
        <li>CU revision tracking</li>
        <li>Life history type information</li>
        <li>Version-controlled releases with changelog</li>
        <li>Data dictionary for consistent interpretation</li>
      </ul>

<script>
// Portfolio modal functionality
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // Get all portfolio cards and modals
  const portfolioCards = document.querySelectorAll('.portfolio-card[data-modal]');
  const modals = document.querySelectorAll('.portfolio-modal');
  const closeButtons = document.querySelectorAll('.portfolio-modal-close');
  const overlays = document.querySelectorAll('.portfolio-modal-overlay');

  // Open modal function
  function openModal(modalId) {
    const modal = document.getElementById(modalId);
    if (modal) {
      modal.classList.add('active');
      document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden'; // Prevent background scrolling
    }
  }

  // Close modal function
  function closeModal(modal) {
    if (modal) {
      modal.classList.remove('active');
      document.body.style.overflow = ''; // Restore scrolling
    }
  }

  // Close all modals function
  function closeAllModals() {
    modals.forEach(modal => {
      closeModal(modal);
    });
  }

  // Add click handlers to portfolio cards
  portfolioCards.forEach(card => {
    card.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
      // Don't open modal if clicking on a link (links handle their own navigation)
      if (e.target.tagName === 'A' || e.target.closest('a')) {
        return;
      }
      const modalId = this.getAttribute('data-modal');
      if (modalId) {
        openModal(modalId);
      }
    });
  });

  // Add click handlers to close buttons
  closeButtons.forEach(button => {
    button.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      const modal = this.closest('.portfolio-modal');
      closeModal(modal);
    });
  });

  // Close modal when clicking overlay
  overlays.forEach(overlay => {
    overlay.addEventListener('click', function() {
      const modal = this.closest('.portfolio-modal');
      closeModal(modal);
    });
  });

  // Close modal with Escape key
  document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
    if (e.key === 'Escape') {
      closeAllModals();
    }
  });
});
</script>
